summary: Implements a configurable Squeeze‑and‑Excitation residual network that builds a stack of bottleneck blocks with channel‑wise attention, supporting various spatial dimensions, channel counts, group convolutions, dropout options, and customizable layer depths, and provides feature extraction and classification outputs.
business_intent: Offer a flexible, high‑performance CNN backbone for image or volumetric classification tasks that leverages SE modules to improve representational power and can be adapted to different model variants (SENet154, SE‑ResNet, SE‑ResNeXt).
